name: df-rnghom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6
body: |- wceq(crh, cmpo(s0, s1, crg, crg, csb(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csb(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), crab(s4, co(cv(s3), cmap, cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s4), cfv(cur, cv(s0))), cfv(cur, cv(s1))), wral(s5, cv(s2), wral(s6, cv(s2), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s4), co(cv(s5), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s6))), co(cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5)), cfv(cplusg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s4), cv(s6)))), wceq(cfv(cv(s4), co(cv(s5), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cv(s6))), co(cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5)), cfv(cmulr, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s4), cv(s6)))))))))))))
comment: Define the set of ring homomorphisms from ` r ` to ` s ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
